1.0.name: wordpress/customize-background-size
1.0.description: This plugin for WordPress adds an option to modify the body background-size property trough the new theme customize controls ( WordPress 3.4+ ). To work, the theme must support the built-in custom background feature.

2.0.name: wordpress/customize-background-size
2.0.description: This plugin for WordPress adds an option to modify the body background-size property trough the new theme customize controls ( WordPress 3.4+ ). To work, the theme must support the built-in custom background feature.
